Visualization.ToUIElement: node => { StackPanel sp = new StackPanel() { HorizontalAlignment = HorizontalAlignment.Center, VerticalAlignment = VerticalAlignment.Center }; sp.Orientation = Orientation.Horizontal; sp.Children.Add(node.Children[1].ToUIElement()); sp.Children.Add(new TextBlock() { Text = " + ", VerticalAlignment = System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center } ); sp.Children.Add(node.Children[0].ToUIElement()); return sp; };

node => { StackPanel sp = new StackPanel() { HorizontalAlignment = HorizontalAlignment.Center, VerticalAlignment = VerticalAlignment.Center }; sp.Orientation = Orientation.Vertical; sp.Children.Add(node.Children[1].ToUIElement()); sp.Children.Add(new Separator()); sp.Children.Add(node.Children[0].ToUIElement()); return sp; };
node => new TextBlock() { Text = node.AsString, HorizontalAlignment = System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center, VerticalAlignment = System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center };
